lore: Although the Revenants have always been at war with each other, there is a sacred code that applies to all of them, and a council that punishes the infidels. When a group of Revenants decided to live in peace in Ahruna with humans and other creatures of the surface, Dagon emerged from the depths to punish them. With a simple glance of this creature, their bodies began to experience drastic changes. They grew legs, their scales became skin, and they were completely transformed into humans.
menagerieDialog: It's a common misconception that all Revenants like to fight. I, for one, would prefer to lead a quiet life and dedicate myself to collecting minerals.
What's wrong? You look like a fish out of water.\n\nHA!
(Revenants hate when you call them "fish people". Never make that mistake.)
I am not a fish. I am NOT. A FISH.\n\n(This is the most sensitive fish you've ever met.)
(It smells like dead fish. Probably because that's exactly what it is.)
name: Revenant Dagon
